properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 c3 v1 c1 c2 c3 v2 c1 c2 c3 v3 c1 c2 c3

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chereko chereko,
chereko, chereko,
chereko (chereko)
chereko chereko
chereko Bwana amefufuka. x2

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Kashinda Yesu
Kashinda tuimbe wote kashinda.

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
(Kashinda Yesu
kashinda tuseme wote kashinda
Ameshinda kifo
kashinda tuseme wote kashinda). x2
Ameshinda mauti watu
wote tumshangilie.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ni siku ya tatu Bwana Yesu kafufuka,
ulimwengu wote leo wunashangilia,
tumshangilie, tumshangilie,
ametukomboa Yesu, tumshangilie.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Wale walomdhihaki wanamshangaa,
Wamebaki vinywa wazi,
wanamshangaaa,
Tumshangilie, tumshangilie
Ametukomboa Yesu, tumshangilie.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Alipofufuka Yesu aliwatokea
mitume wake wote akawaambia,
nimefufuka, nimefufuka,
na bado ni ngali hai, msiogope.
